title: Design of a Customized Web-Based Language Leadership Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in language education
context.additional_context: Enhancing practical leadership competencies for corporate managers/leaders through learner-tailored language education design in web-based environments.

learning_goals: Development of language education design plans tailored to learner profiles (background, learning style, preferences) using web-based tools (LMS, content builders, etc.)
Measurement of customized instructional design effectiveness and proposal of improvement directions through project-based assessment methods
Application of interactive content creation techniques to enhance learner engagement in digital device-supported environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
